 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎הַמְנִיכָא‎</span> [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] ([[BDB#Kt|Kt]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎המינכָא‎</span>, also [Gi] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎המוניכא‎</span>, etc.) **noun [masculine]** ==chain, necklace== (Talmud <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎הַמְנִכָּא‎</span> [[BDB#Dalm|D]]<sup>WB 108</sup>; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; loan-word from Greek <span class="bdbLangGreek">μανιάκης</span> [[BDB#Kau|K]]<sup>§ 64, 4</sup>; or &lt; Persian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***hämy¹n***</u></abbr>, ***girdle*** [diminutive would be <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***hamy¹nak***</u></abbr>] (whence also Greek <span class="bdbLangGreek">μαν</span>., [[BDB#Bev|Bev]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]<sup>[[Dan.5.7|Dan 5:7]]</sup>) [[BDB#Andr|Andr]]<sup>M 60\*</sup> (reading <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎הַמְיָֽנְכָא‎</span>); see also [[BDB#Behrm|Behrm]]<sup>ix</sup> [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>Ges. Abh. 40; Arm. Stud. 1420</sup>; see [[BDB#Krauss|Krauss]]<sup>5 f.</sup> (who compares also Talmud <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מוּנְיָיק‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מָנְיָיק‎</span> ***necklace, bracelet***, [[BDB#Levy|Levy]]<sup>NHWB iii. 52 b, 158 b</sup> [[BDB#Dalm|D]]<sup>230</sup>)); — of gold, [[Dan.5.7|Dan 5:7]]; [[Dan.5.16|Dan 5:16]]; [[Dan.5.29|Dan 5:29]].
